r.s: DataSource driver using PEAR::DB and an SQL query
r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using PEAR::DB and an SQL query.
r.n: - added multiple fields sorting support (multiSort) - Bug #7870: this driver now takes an existing ORDER BY statement in the query into account - in addition to 'GROUP BY', also 'DISTINCT' in queries needs special handling for determing the number of rows
